title: The Bushes are Red
description: Lindy and Ricky are all grown up and have children of their own. Through hard work, perseverence and determination they have made it! They are living the American dream, surrounding themselves and their two children, Samantha and Michael with love and comfort, and a safe environment. Still wildly in love with each other, Lindy and Ricky focus on their family and a lifestyle that provides their children with security and the knowledge that they are loved. Their house is full of love and happiness until....Samantha is gone!Where? Who took her? Why?Lindy and Ricky's emotions go on a wild rollercoaster ride as they face every parent's worst nightmare. They are grateful for the love and support of their family and friends who rally around doing whatever they can to help, because Lindy and Ricky can only focus on one They have to get Samantha back! The only clue they have to go on is that Samantha is somewhere where the bushes are red.
author: Carole McKee
